description.value:
Beginning at 3rd level, you can customize your @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-class-features.cjajYC1CWTxeyOta]{Arcane Armor}. When you do so, choose one of the following armor models: Guardian or Infiltrator. The model you choose gives you special benefits while you wear it.

Each model includes a special weapon. When you attack with that weapon, you can add your Intelligence modifier, instead of Strength or Dexterity, to the attack and damage rolls.

You can change the armor's model whenever you finish a short or long rest, provided you have @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-items.O1YQD4dGJgYz8PWD]{Smith's Tools} in hand.

Guardian Armor

You design your armor to be in the front line of conflict. It has the following features:

@Compendium[5e-complete.5e-items.71nUe2T9S2qw9f3U]{Thunder Gauntlets}

Each of the armor's gauntlets counts as a simple melee weapon that deal lightning damage and distract foes.

@Compendium[5e-complete.5e-class-features.7jWZ23RwE8X6BwrI]{Defensive Field}

As a bonus action, you can gain temporary hit points equal to your level in this class.

Infiltrator Armor

You customize your armor for subtle undertakings. It has the following features:

@Compendium[5e-complete.5e-items.dlXh14D417B3VEdM]{Lightning Launcher}

A gemlike node appears on one of your armored fists or on the chest, allowing you to deal lightning damage at range.

Powered Steps

Your walking speed increases by 5 feet.

Dampening Field

You have advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks. If the armor normally imposes disadvantage on such checks, the advantage and disadvantage cancel each other, as normal.

activation.condition: Whenever you finish a Short or Long Rest
